section.section: Of the 13 members, 3 shall be public members appointed by the Governor with the advice and consent of the Senate.

text.section: A public member may not be an individual who otherwise qualifies for membership under subsection (a)(2) of this section.

section.section: The term of a member is 10 years.
Except for an ex officio member, the terms of members are staggered as required by the terms provided for members of the Council on July 1, 1982.
At the end of a term, a member continues to serve until a successor is appointed and qualifies.
A member who is appointed after a term has begun serves only for the rest of the term and until a successor is appointed and qualifies.
